title: How to Search a Phone Number on Facebook

steps.title: Go to https://facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://facebook.com in a web browser. This method will work the same on computers, phones, and tablets. Login if prompted . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the search bar to activate the text field.
steps.content: Click the search bar to activate the text field. You'll see this bar at the top of the page. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the 10-digit phone number including area code.
steps.content: Enter the 10-digit phone number including area code. Make sure you press the ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return key on your keyboard to initiate the search. You can enter the phone number like "(555)555-5555" or "5555555555," as the formatting does not matter. [3] X Research source A single search result should appear. If you don't get a result, that person probably has their profile set to private and won't show up in search results. It's also possible they may not have a Facebook account connected to that phone number.

steps.title: Click that search result.
steps.content: Click that search result. That is the Facebook account associated with the phone number you entered.

steps.title: Open Facebook on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your phone or tablet. This app looks like a white "f" on a blue background. You can find this app on your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching. [4] X Research source This method works for both iOS and Android phones and tablets.

steps.title: Tap the search icon .
steps.content: Tap the search icon . You'll see this magnifying glass in the upper right corner of the app. [5] X Research source When you tap the search icon, you'll see a list of all your recent searches as well as your keyboard.

steps.title: Type the number you want to search.
steps.content: Type the number you want to search. You might have to press the ?123 key to switch to the non-alphabetical keyboard. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the 10-digit phone number including area code.
steps.content: Enter the 10-digit phone number including area code. Make sure you tap the search or enter key on your keyboard to initiate the search. You can enter "(555)555-5555" or "5555555555," the formatting does not matter. A single search result should appear. If you don't get a result, that person probably has their profile set to private and won't show up in search results.

steps.title: Tap that search result.
steps.content: Tap that search result. That is the Facebook account associated with the phone number you entered.
